abstract: Howard D. Schultz said he will bring a “laser-like focus” to improving the customer experience and making sure that the “Starbucks’ experience” is different from rivals.
snippet: Howard D. Schultz said he will bring a “laser-like focus” to improving the customer experience and making sure that the “Starbucks’ experience” is different from rivals.
lead_paragraph: With the stock plummeting and rivals on the attack, Starbucks is bringing back its top barista to turn the company around.

abstract: Colony Capital, a private equity firm focused on real estate, said on Monday that it had hired Richard D. Nanula as a principal with a senior role in the firm.
lead_paragraph: Colony Capital, a private equity firm focused on real estate, said on Monday that it had hired Richard D. Nanula as a principal with a senior role in the firm.

headline.main: Colony Capital Hires Ex-Amgen C.F.O. as Principal
